subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution . European continent (Western, Central, Eastern); Asia: South Korea (GG), Armenia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , China (Northeast, North, Northwest, Southwest), Japan , Kirgizia , Mongolia , Russia , Tadzhikistan , Uzbekistan ; North America (Introduced) (
Kerzhner & Josifov 1999
,
Duwal et al. 2010 a
).
